## Preliminaries

```{r}
#| label: install packages

install.packages("data.table") 
install.packages("dplyr") 
library(data.table)

LCdata <- fread("LCdata.csv")

set.seed(4) 
myLCdata <- LCdata %>% sample(5) %>% slice_sample(prop = .5)
```
